entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 06 March 2023
